item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/african-black-soap/#comment-256">Suzi</a>.
Haha! Sorry! I'm just so curious! I hope the Fresh cleanser works out for you. Usually, when I replace a product, I return it to Sephora, but I'm still keeping mine. It is a REALLY nice product.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

Haha! Sorry! I’m just so curious! I hope the Fresh cleanser works out for you. Usually, when I replace a product, I return it to Sephora, but I’m still keeping mine. It is a REALLY nice product.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/african-black-soap/#comment-258">CJo</a>.
I'm sure you can get it at any health food store around you. They have it at Cone's, Lassen's, and The Vitamin Shoppe here, so it isn't unusual. Or, you can order it online at the link I posted.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to CJo.

I’m sure you can get it at any health food store around you. They have it at Cone’s, Lassen’s, and The Vitamin Shoppe here, so it isn’t unusual. Or, you can order it online at the link I posted.

item.title: By: CJo
item.dc:creator: CJo
item.description: Where else can you pick this up? I am sans a Cones.
item.content:encoded: Where else can you pick this up? I am sans a Cones.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: Damn...I can't keep up with you lady! :) Just ordered the Fresh cleanser yesterday based on your glowing review, but if it doesn't do the trick I know what's getting loaded into my beauty queue next. My skin isn't completely terrible, but I definitely have one of those bright red been here so long no way it's a zit things hanging out on my nose. I would be blown away if this made it disappear.
item.content:encoded: Damn…I can’t keep up with you lady! ðŸ™‚ Just ordered the Fresh cleanser yesterday based on your glowing review, but if it doesn’t do the trick I know what’s getting loaded into my beauty queue next. My skin isn’t completely terrible, but I definitely have one of those bright red been here so long no way it’s a zit things hanging out on my nose. I would be blown away if this made it disappear.

item.description: My face has been totally zitty lately. And I was going to ask you how to heal me. Thanks for this! Must go black.

item.title: By: Jono Nelson
item.dc:creator: Jono Nelson
item.description: I've been having the exact same sweat-induced-nasty-skin-attack problems. I'm sprinting out to the store to pick one of these bad boys up ASAP.
